alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Rockcastle; Wayne (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 2:31PM EST until March 03 at 2:45PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wayne County in south central Kentucky... Central Pulaski County in south central Kentucky... Southwestern Rockcastle County in south central Kentucky... * Until 245 PM EST. * At 230 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mill Springs, or near Monticello, moving northeast at 115 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pulaski County Park around 235 PM EST. Science Hill around 240 PM EST. Woodstock around 245 PM EST. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for south central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for south central Kentucky.
